Test Name: Carmine Dye/Red Dye Cochineal (Dactylopius coccus) IgE (Red # 4)
Purpose: To detect and quantify specific IgE antibodies to Carmine Dye/Red Dye Cochineal (Red # 4) for diagnosing allergy or hypersensitivity.
Container: Serum separator (SST) or red-top tube for serum; EDTA, heparin, or citrate tube for plasma
Equipment: Specific IgE assay kit with ELISA reader or automated immunoassay analyzer, centrifuge, pipettes
